Class InstructorAppService

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.service.InstructorAppService
@Service public class InstructorAppService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing instructor applications.

Provides functionalities such as saving new instructor applications, retrieving applications based on user ID and status, and updating application statuses.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • InstructorAppService

      public InstructorAppService()

  • Method Details

    • existPendingApplicationForUser

      public boolean existPendingApplicationForUser(String userId)
      Checks if a pending instructor application exists for a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      true if a pending application exists, false otherwise

    • saveInstructorApp

      public void saveInstructorApp(User user, @Valid @Valid InstructorAppDto dto)
      Saves a new instructor application for a user.

      Validates the user's current role and existing applications before saving a new application.

      Parameters:
      user - the User submitting the instructor application
      dto - the data transfer object containing application details
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyInstructorException - if the user is already an instructor
      AdminCannotBeInstructorException - if the user is an admin and cannot become an instructor
      InstructorAppAlreadyExistsException - if a pending application already exists for the user

    • findByUserId

      public List<InstructorApp> findByUserId(String id, @Nullable String statusString)
      Retrieves a list of instructor applications for a specific user ID and optional status filter.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user
      statusString - the status filter for applications (e.g., "PENDING", "APPROVED", "REJECTED")
      Returns:
      a list of InstructorApp matching the criteria
      Throws:
      UnknownApplicationStatusException - if the provided status string does not match any valid status

    • findById

      public InstructorApp findById(UUID id)
      Retrieves an instructor application by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the instructor application
      Returns:
      the InstructorApp corresponding to the provided ID
      Throws:
      InstructorAppNotFoundException - if no application is found with the given ID

    • findAll

      public List<InstructorApp> findAll()
      Retrieves all instructor applications.
      Returns:
      a list of all InstructorApp entries

    • findPendingApplications

      public List<InstructorApp> findPendingApplications()
      Retrieves all pending instructor applications.
      Returns:
      a list of InstructorApp entries with ApplicationStatus.PENDING status

    • update

      public void update(InstructorApp application)
      Updates an existing instructor application.
      Parameters:
      application - the InstructorApp entity to update

    • cancelPendingInstructorApplication

      public void cancelPendingInstructorApplication(User user)
      Cancels a pending instructor application for a user.

      Updates the status of the latest pending application to ApplicationStatus.REJECTED with a predefined admin message.

      Parameters:
      user - the User requesting the cancellation of their pending application
      Throws:
      InstructorAppNotFoundException - if no pending application is found for the user
